creator: rleismann@was-medien.de
text:
It's a ASP Software with PHP and MySql.
Apache use the OpenSSL mod_ssl with our own Certificate.
It runs fine but in many situations the Browser said Server or DNS not found.
Without SSL this error is not reportet.

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
This is rather hard to debug with the available details.  I suggest you
address your question to the mod_ssl users mailing list and see
if they have suggestions.  Since it is a 1.3 mod_ssl problem, the next
step would be the mod_ssl bug database.

Thanks for using Apache.
